Localisation.Text: Saurena swings her blade, cutting down all foes in the [GOLD]3[] tiles in front of her, dealing [GOLD]150%[] damage to each.
Saurena channels unleashes a burst of energy through her blade the moment it connects, dealing [GOLD]120%[] damage. This attack always triggers a critical effect.
Saurena kicks the enemy, dealing [GOLD]60%[] damage and sending them flying backwards, stunning them for [GOLD]3[] turns.
Saurena drinks a healing potion, restoring [GOLD]10%[] of her max health each round for [GOLD]7[] rounds.
Saurena smashes her blade into the ground, damaging all enemies in the shockwave for [GOLD]80%[] damage and stunning them for [GOLD]1[] turn.
Saurena flies into a deadly rage for [GOLD]8[] turns. Magic infuses her body, raising her attack by [GOLD]20%[], her critical effect chance by [GOLD]20%[], and her armour by [GOLD]20%[].
